name: Run And Cube
description:
My Youtube Channel

Run And Cube is a game that you need to survive as long as possible. Some objects will fall from above and you need to escape from them to survive.

You can jump to other sides of the platform you are playing on. Platform is square so you can use all of the 4 side. If you feel stuck in one side go and jump to other side.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control Keys

A  ===>  Move Left

D  ===>  Move Right

Space  ===>  Jump

R  ===>   Restart

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Falling Objects

Squares are gonna block the way.

Triangles are gonna kill you if you collide with them like a spike.

Hexagons are gonna explode and destroy the objects near them and kill you if you near too.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game made in GeoJam 2022 where goal was making games with geometric shapes and the theme was pick a side.
